about.title: About me
about.text: I am a student of Analysis and Systems Development (ADS) at Fatec Carapicuíba, passionate about programming, always seeking new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow. I have experience in front-end and back-end development, with knowledge of modern tools and DevOps practices. I am always ready to contribute with my skills and work in a team to create effective and innovative solutions.

responsibilities.description: I worked as support for my department, with the following responsibilities:
tasks: Manage and analyze user feedback on the FAQ page, identifying key points and suggesting improvements.
Perform data analysis related to the FAQ to understand performance and identify improvement opportunities.
Create a weekly banner highlighting the best compliment received from users, as a recognition for employees.
Provide support for other tasks as needed, ensuring smooth operations.

bootcamps.course: Sysvision - Data Analytics with Power BI

frontEnd.description: Experience in creating responsive and dynamic user interfaces, using best practices and modern frameworks.

devOps.description: Knowledge in automating environments and version control to ensure agile and integrated workflows.

skills.note: Although I have experience with the mentioned technologies, I am a beginner in the field and recognize that there is always more to learn. I am continuously improving my skills and staying updated with the latest trends and best practices in the industry.

projects.name: Grandes Mentes
projects.description: This project uses the 'Pensador' API to display reflective and inspirational quotes from four famous philosophers.
